</s>A smile is a beautiful thing. It can light up a room and bring joy to everyone around it. It can also be a source of comfort and support during difficult times. Whether you're feeling happy or sad, a smile can always brighten up your day.
</s>A beautiful thing is something that is very good or attractive in appearance or quality. In this case, the object of the sentence is a smile, which is a facial expression that is often associated with happiness and friendliness
